import Style from "./Navbar.module.css"; import { Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import logo from "../../Assets/images/2ebd433f-3f08-43e9-9d4c-8498f7ecd9b8.jpeg"; import { useContext } from "react"; import { UserContext } from "../Context/UserContext"; export default function Navbar() { let { userToken , setUserToken } = useContext(UserContext); let navigate = useNavigate() function logout(){ localStorage.setItem("userToken", null); setUserToken(null); navigate('/Login') } return (
    {userToken !== null ? ( <>
  • Home
  • product
  • Category
  • Brands
  • Cart
    • ) : ( "" )}
    • {userToken !== null ? ( <>
  • logout()} className="nav-link active cursor-pointer" aria-current="page"> Logout
    • ) : ( <>
  • Login
  • Register
    • )}
); }
